function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Research involving viral titers may pose a risk of accidental exposure and transmission of the virus.","Impact":"Unmitigated exposure can lead to the spread of the virus and potential infection of researchers and lab personnel.","Mitigation":"Implement strict biosafety protocols, use proper personal protective equipment, and conduct research in a controlled environment such as a biosafety level 2 or higher laboratory.","Technologies":"Biological safety cabinets, autoclaves, and disinfectants for decontamination.","People":"Researchers, lab personnel, and anyone in the vicinity of the research area.","Owner":"Laboratory supervisors, biosafety officers, and researchers."}]}
